snippet.title: Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
✨ Welcome to Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi! ✨

Looking for a cozy and relaxing space on your desktop? 🏡
Mini Cozy Room: Lo-Fi is a charming idle game where you decorate, relax, and enjoy lo-fi vibes right on your screen.

🌟 Features:
🛋️ Decorate your room with stylish furniture and cute decorations!
📖 Jot down your thoughts and keep track of your to-dos!
🎵 Enjoy lo-fi music while you work or relax!
🐱 Adopt a pet and make your space even cozier!
🕹️ A chill desktop experience that blends productivity with relaxation!

🎮 Wishlist on Steam now and don’t miss the official launch!
🔗 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3511030/____LoFi/ 

#MiniCozyRoom #lofi  #cozygames  #indiegame  #relaxinggames  #steamgame  #idlegame
